page.title: 13INTERVIEW WITH SISTER MARY
page.content: Q:what do you miss, if anything about "normal life?" A: At first we missed our families and friends,but now we are used to it. Q: How long have you been at St Francis? A: From 1942 onwards . Q: What is your main task/work?. A: Mary works in the garden and with one helper, Sister Giovanna. Q: Why did you want to become a nun?. A: Because God called her. Q: what do you do in the evenings?. A: Make things to sell,Scrabble,read Q: What do you eat and drink? A: They eat and drink most things like we do and an occasional glass of wine. Q: Are you allowed to visit outside?. A: Yes they do,for shopping,visiting. Q: Are you allowed to leave the convent once you have taken your Life Vows of Poverty,Chastity & Obedience?
